ComicInfo.Summary:
SynopsisEDDIE NEALE is a recaptured P.O.W. Narrowly avoiding a watery grave, he's thrown into solitary confinement. Things look bleak. UNDEAD German soldiers. MAD dogs. A Kommandant struggling to maintain order. Evidence of UNEARTHLY HORRORS hiding in the lake's murky depths! Maybe being locked up...is the safest place to be?
PlotThe Nazis patrol returns to Lungotz Luftzig, with their prisoner Eddie Neale, and after they explain to Kommandant Von-Kleist about the monster in the lake, the Kommandant orders Eddie into Solitary Confinement Cell 9.
Kommandant then learns the curse of the lake and bell tower, a story he doesn't believe in until a giant monster with Muggenthaler, emerges from lake and carries the Kommandant off.
Meanwhile, in the dungeon Sister Evangaline sneaks into Eddie's cell to give him food and a lantern, but she is shoot in the back by the guard, dying in Eddie's arms for her kindness.
Notes
